column2: This will change the appearance of your mount and unlock this mount skin for all characters on your account. Mounts must be unlocked before mount skins can be applied.
Attend the opening ceremony of the Festival of the Four Winds with Ellen Kiel and Evon Gnashblade.

%num1%/3 Zones Completed
in World 1 in Tribulation Mode
A recipe to make an exotic warhorn with Plaguedoctor's (+Condition Damage, +Vitality, +Concentration, and +Healing Power) stats.
A recipe to make ascended heavy gloves with Plaguedoctor's (+Condition Damage, +Vitality, +Concentration, and +Healing Power) stats.
Release the Mists from your aura with a chance to inflict conditions based on your current legend.
You hear a loud rumbling and clanking coming from the east.
A recipe to make an ascended warhorn with Plaguedoctor's (+Condition Damage, +Vitality, +Concentration, and +Healing Power) stats.
Remove a condition when you are struck. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 30 Seconds)</c>
A recipe to make an ascended light helm with Plaguedoctor's (+Condition Damage, +Vitality, +Concentration, and +Healing Power) stats.
A recipe to make an ascended torch with Plaguedoctor's (+Condition Damage, +Vitality, +Concentration, and +Healing Power) stats.
Gain fury for 6 seconds when entering combat. (Cooldown: 10 Seconds)
Appear as a palm tree to unobservant passersby.
+10%% Condition Duration; create a death nova at a foe's location upon their defeat. (Cooldown: 15 Seconds)
Complete World 2, Zone 1 on Infantile Mode.
Open the Mists around you to fire multiple projectiles at your enemy, with a chance to inflict conditions based on your current legend.
A recipe to make an ascended heavy helm with Plaguedoctor's (+Condition Damage, +Vitality, +Concentration, and +Healing Power) stats.
Can be traded with vendors in the Domain of Kourna or consumed for volatile magic.
A recipe to make an exotic trident with Plaguedoctor's (+Condition Damage, +Vitality, +Concentration, and +Healing Power) stats.
Once placed, detonates when enemies get close.
Double-click to apply this to a gathering tool.
Summon golems that self-destruct near enemies.
A recipe to make an exotic short bow with Plaguedoctor's (+Condition Damage, +Vitality, +Concentration, and +Healing Power) stats.
Collect %num2% sky crystal[s] in the Labyrinthine Cliffs.

Capture a nearby dust mite twister in a canister.

<c=@warning>WARNING:</c> This temporarily lifts cloaking effects.
While diving for treasure in Sawtooth Bay, an adventurer sighted a disrupted portal.

<c=@abilitytype>Stealth Attack.<c/> Blind your foe by bashing them with your sword hilt, or daze them if you attack from behind. Applies vulnerability. Consumes all malice when striking your mark to restore endurance based on the malice used.

Double-click to feed this tasty treat to your roller beetle.

Gives bonus Mastery experience once per day.
A recipe to make an exotic sword with Plaguedoctor's (+Condition Damage, +Vitality, +Concentration, and +Healing Power) stats.
Complete Zone 1, Zone 2, and Zone 3 in World 1.
A recipe to make an exotic focus with Plaguedoctor's (+Condition Damage, +Vitality, +Concentration, and +Healing Power) stats.
Release a blast of Mists energy that heals allies and knocks enemies back, infusing your foes with dangerous power. Inflict conditions based on your current legend each time a target is struck.
Collect %num2% master sky crystal[s] in the Labyrinthine Cliffs.
A race around the Super Adventure Box hub is about to begin!
A recipe to make an ascended mace with Plaguedoctor's (+Condition Damage, +Vitality, +Concentration, and +Healing Power) stats.

<c=@abilitytype>Stealth Attack.<c/> Sneak attack with a rapid fire from your pistol that makes your foe bleed. Consumes all malice when striking your mark to inflict additional torment per bullet used.
Fire a barrage of bouncing light missiles that damage enemies and heal allies.
The Order of the Crystal Bloom has begun to disrupt the central Brandstorm.
Consortium after-incident documents describe a brief light from the cliffs overlooking Owain's Refuge.
A recipe to make exotic medium shoulders with Plaguedoctor's (+Condition Damage, +Vitality, +Concentration, and +Healing Power) stats.
Throw a water balloon at Evon Gnashblade and get him soaked.
Consuming this item will grant you one random mount skin from the Black Lion Stables.
A recipe to make an ascended greatsword with Plaguedoctor's (+Condition Damage, +Vitality, +Concentration, and +Healing Power) stats.
Nearby Creatures Are Absorbing Wild Magic!
A recipe to make ascended light gloves with Plaguedoctor's (+Condition Damage, +Vitality, +Concentration, and +Healing Power) stats.
Complete Zone 1, Zone 2, and Zone 3 in World 2.
Find all the crystals before time runs out!
A recipe to make exotic medium leggings with Plaguedoctor's (+Condition Damage, +Vitality, +Concentration, and +Healing Power) stats.
Unlock a new mount of your choice.
Gain a mount skin of your choice from the Black Lion Stables. Right-click to preview available mount skins.

Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time. Combine the Mini Super Trioâ€”Series 3 in the Mystic Forge with a Continue Coin to unlock the Mini Super Angry Cloud.
A recipe to make exotic heavy gloves with Plaguedoctor's (+Condition Damage, +Vitality, +Concentration, and +Healing Power) stats.
<c=@flavor>These fell out of use in the chaos following the raising of Orr.</c>
A recipe to make an ascended scepter with Plaguedoctor's (+Condition Damage, +Vitality, +Concentration, and +Healing Power) stats.
Quickly Finished the Flying Dolyak Race in the Labyrinthine Cliffs
Adopt a new version of your mounts.
Used to gather all plants. Unlimited use.
A recipe to make exotic medium gloves with Plaguedoctor's (+Condition Damage, +Vitality, +Concentration, and +Healing Power) stats.
<c=@reminder>This mini can be found inside Black Lion Chests.</c>
Grants a 33%% chance to reward a bonus watchwork sprocket while gathering in addition to the gathering results.
Drops the cloaking effect to quickly dissipate heat. Has a long recharge; use sparingly.

Double-click to apply this look to any other dagger.
This will also unlock this skin for your wardrobe.
